title: Handbook to prayer: Praying Scripture back to God
description: This prayer tool will guide you through the process of praying Scripture back to God. It gives you form and freedom as well as a “balanced diet” in your prayers, since each day includes prayers of adoration, confession, renewal, petition, intercession, affirmation, thanksgiving, and closing prayers. Bound in burgundy leather with gilded edges and a ribbon bookmark. 480 pages
author: Kenneth D. Boa
